verses.verse: But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> to the <S%G3735>Mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives.<s%>

And <S%G3722>early<s%> in the <S%G3722>morning<s%> He <S%G3854>came<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> into the <S%G2413>temple,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> were <S%G2064>coming<s%> to Him; and He <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G2523>down<s%> and [began] to <S%G1321>teach<s%> them.

And the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G71>brought<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2638>caught<s%> in <S%G3430>adultery,<s%> and having <S%G2476>set<s%> her in the <S%G3319>midst,<s%>
they <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1135>woman<s%> has been <S%G2638>caught<s%> in <S%G3431>adultery,<s%> in the <S%G7024>very<s%> <S%G7024>act.<s%>

<S%G1161>"Now<s%> in the <S%G3551>Law<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1781>commanded<s%> us to <S%G3034>stone<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G5108>women;<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> do You <S%G3004>say<s%>?"

And they were <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> <S%G3985>testing<s%> Him, in <S%G2443>order<s%> that they might <S%G2192>have<s%> grounds for <S%G2723>accusing<s%> Him. But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2955>stooped<s%> <S%G2736>down,<s%> and with His <S%G1147>finger<s%> <S%G7103>wrote<s%> on the <S%G1093>ground.<s%>

But <S%G5613>when<s%> they <S%G1961>persisted<s%> in <S%G2065>asking<s%> Him, He <S%G352>straightened<s%> up, and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "He who is <S%G361>without<s%> <S%G361>sin<s%> among you, let him [be the] <S%G4413>first<s%> to <S%G906>throw<s%> a <S%G3037>stone<s%> at her."
And <S%G3825>again<s%> He <S%G7107>stooped<s%> <S%G7107>down,<s%> and <S%G1125>wrote<s%> on the <S%G1093>ground.<s%>

And when they <S%G191>heard<s%> it, they [began] to <S%G1831>go<s%> out <S%G1520>one<s%> by <S%G1520>one,<s%> <S%G757>beginning<s%> with the <S%G4245>older<s%> <S%G4245>ones,<s%> and He was <S%G2641>left<s%> <S%G3441>alone,<s%> and the <S%G1135>woman,<s%> where she was, in the <S%G3319>midst.<s%>
And <S%G352>straightening<s%> up, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to her, <S%G1135>"Woman,<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> are they? Did <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G2632>condemn<s%> you?"

And she <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3762>"No<s%> <S%G3762>one,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>" And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3761>"Neither<s%> do I <S%G2632>condemn<s%> you; <S%G4198>go<s%> your <S%G4198>way.<s%> From <S%G3568>now<s%> on <S%G264>sin<s%> <S%G3371>no<s%> <S%G3371>more.<s%>" ]

<S%G3825>Again<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%> of the <S%G2889>world;<s%> he who <S%G190>follows<s%> Me shall not <S%G4043>walk<s%> in the <S%G4653>darkness,<s%> but shall <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%> of <S%G2222>life.<s%>"

The <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "You are <S%G3140>bearing<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of <S%G4572>Yourself;<s%> Your <S%G3141>witness<s%> is not <S%G227>true.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G2579>"Even<s%> <S%G2579>if<s%> I <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of <S%G1683>Myself,<s%> My <S%G3141>witness<s%> is <S%G227>true;<s%> for I <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G4159>where<s%> I <S%G2064>came<s%> from, and <S%G4226>where<s%> I am <S%G5217>going;<s%> but you do not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G4159>where<s%> I <S%G2064>come<s%> from, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> I am <S%G5217>going.<s%>
"You people <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh;<s%> I am not <S%G2919>judging<s%> <S%G3762>anyone.<s%>

"But <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> I do <S%G2919>judge,<s%> My <S%G2920>judgment<s%> is <S%G228>true;<s%> for I <S%G1510>am<s%> not <S%G3441>alone<s%> [in it,] but I and He who <S%G3992>sent<s%> Me.
<S%G2532>"Even<s%> in your <S%G3551>law<s%> it has been <S%G1125>written,<s%> that the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> of <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> is <S%G227>true.<s%>
"I <S%G1510>am<s%> He who <S%G3140>bears<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of <S%G1683>Myself,<s%> and the <S%G3962>Father<s%> who <S%G3992>sent<s%> Me <S%G3140>bears<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of Me."

And <S%G3767>so<s%> they were <S%G3004>saying<s%> to Him, <S%G4226>"Where<s%> is Your <S%G3962>Father<s%>?" <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> "You <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> Me, <S%G3777>nor<s%> My <S%G3962>Father;<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G3609>knew<s%> Me, you would <S%G3609>know<s%> My <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>"

<S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G4487>words<s%> He <S%G2980>spoke<s%> in the <S%G1049>treasury,<s%> as He <S%G1321>taught<s%> in the <S%G2413>temple;<s%> and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G4084>seized<s%> Him, <S%G3754>because<s%> His <S%G5610>hour<s%> had not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G2064>come.<s%>

He <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to them, "I <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G5217>away,<s%> and you shall <S%G2212>seek<s%> Me, and shall <S%G599>die<s%> in your <S%G266>sin;<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> I am <S%G5217>going,<s%> you <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2064>come.<s%>"

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3385>"Surely<s%> He will not <S%G615>kill<s%> <S%G1438>Himself,<s%> will He, <S%G3754>since<s%> He <S%G3004>says,<s%> <S%G3699>'Where<s%> I am <S%G5217>going,<s%> you <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2064>come<s%>'?"

And He was <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, "You are from <S%G2736>below,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> from <S%G507>above;<s%> you are of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> not of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2889>world.<s%>

"I <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to you, that you shall <S%G599>die<s%> in your <S%G266>sins;<s%> for <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> you <S%G4100>believe<s%> that I <S%G1510>am<s%> [He], you shall <S%G599>die<s%> in your <S%G266>sins.<s%>"

And <S%G3767>so<s%> they were <S%G3004>saying<s%> to Him, <S%G5101>"Who<s%> are You?" <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3739>"What<s%> <S%G5101><s%> have I been <S%G2980>saying<s%> to you [from] the <S%G746>beginning<s%>?

"I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4183>things<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> and to <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> you, but He who <S%G3992>sent<s%> Me is <S%G227>true;<s%> and the things <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> from Him, <S%G3778>these<s%> I <S%G2980>speak<s%> to the <S%G2889>world.<s%>"
They did not <S%G1097>realize<s%> that He had been <S%G3004>speaking<s%> to them about the <S%G3962>Father.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3752>"When<s%> you <S%G5312>lift<s%> up the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man,<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> you will <S%G1097>know<s%> that I <S%G1510>am<s%> [He,] and I <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> on My <S%G1683>own<s%> <S%G1683>initiative,<s%> but I <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> as the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1321>taught<s%> Me.
"And He who <S%G3992>sent<s%> Me is with Me; He has not <S%G863>left<s%> Me <S%G3441>alone,<s%> for I <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G701>things<s%> that are <S%G701>pleasing<s%> to Him."
As He <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> came to <S%G4100>believe<s%> in Him.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> was <S%G3004>saying<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> who had <S%G4100>believed<s%> Him, <S%G1437>"If<s%> you <S%G3306>abide<s%> in My <S%G3056>word,<s%> [then] you are <S%G230>truly<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> of <S%G1473>Mine;<s%>
and you shall <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G225>truth,<s%> and the <S%G225>truth<s%> shall <S%G1659>make<s%> you <S%G1659>free.<s%> "

They <S%G611>answered<s%> Him, "We are Abraham's <S%G4690>offspring,<s%> and have <S%G3762>never<s%> <S%G4455><s%> <S%G4455>yet<s%> been <S%G1398>enslaved<s%> to <S%G3762>anyone;<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> is it that You <S%G3004>say,<s%> 'You shall <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G1658>free<s%>' ?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> them, <S%G281>"Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G4160>commits<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> is the <S%G1401>slave<s%> of <S%G266>sin.<s%>
"And the <S%G1401>slave<s%> does not <S%G3306>remain<s%> in the <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G165>forever;<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> does <S%G3306>remain<s%> <S%G165>forever.<s%>
<S%G1437>"If<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> shall <S%G1659>make<s%> you <S%G1659>free,<s%> you shall be <S%G1658>free<s%> <S%G3689>indeed.<s%>

"I <S%G3609>know<s%> that you are Abraham's <S%G4690>offspring;<s%> <S%G235>yet<s%> you <S%G2212>seek<s%> to <S%G615>kill<s%> Me, <S%G3754>because<s%> My <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G5562>has<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5562>place<s%> in you.

"I <S%G2980>speak<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> I have <S%G3708>seen<s%> with [My] <S%G3962>Father;<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G191>heard<s%> from [your] <S%G3962>father.<s%>"

They <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G11>"Abraham<s%> is our <S%G3962>father.<s%>" <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G1487>"If<s%> you are <S%G11>Abraham<s%>'s <S%G5043>children,<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G2041>deeds<s%> of Abraham.

"But as it is, you are <S%G2212>seeking<s%> to <S%G615>kill<s%> Me, a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> has <S%G2980>told<s%> you the <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> from <S%G2316>God;<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> did not <S%G4160>do.<s%>

"You are <S%G4160>doing<s%> the <S%G2041>deeds<s%> of your <S%G3962>father.<s%>" They <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "We were not <S%G1080>born<s%> of <S%G4202>fornication;<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> [even] <S%G2316>God.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G1487>"If<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> were your <S%G3962>Father,<s%> you would <S%G25>love<s%> Me; for I <S%G1831>proceeded<s%> <S%G1831>forth<s%> and <S%G2240>have<s%> <S%G2240>come<s%> from <S%G2316>God,<s%> for I have not <S%G3761>even<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> on My <S%G1683>own<s%> <S%G1683>initiative,<s%> but He <S%G649>sent<s%> Me.

<S%G1223>"Why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> do you not <S%G1097>understand<s%> <S%G2981>what<s%> I am <S%G2981>saying<s%>? [It is] <S%G3754>because<s%> you <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G191>hear<s%> My <S%G3056>word.<s%>

"You are of [your] <S%G3962>father<s%> the <S%G1228>devil,<s%> and you <S%G2309>want<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G1939>desires<s%> of your <S%G3962>father.<s%> He was a <S%G443>murderer<s%> from the <S%G746>beginning,<s%> and does not <S%G4739>stand<s%> in the <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> there is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%> in him. <S%G3752>Whenever<s%> he <S%G2980>speaks<s%> a <S%G5579>lie,<s%> he <S%G2980>speaks<s%> from his <S%G2398>own<s%> [nature;] for he is a <S%G5583>liar,<s%> and the <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G846>lies.<s%>
"But <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G3004>speak<s%> the <S%G225>truth,<s%> you do not <S%G4100>believe<s%> Me.

<S%G5101>"Which<s%> <S%G5101>one<s%> of you <S%G1651>convicts<s%> Me of <S%G266>sin<s%>? <S%G1487>If<s%> I <S%G3004>speak<s%> <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G1223>why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> do you not <S%G4100>believe<s%> Me?

"He who is of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G191>hears<s%> the <S%G4487>words<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> for <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason<s%> you do not <S%G191>hear<s%> [them,] <S%G3754>because<s%> you are not of <S%G2316>God.<s%>"

The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "Do we not <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G2573>rightly<s%> that You are a <S%G4541>Samaritan<s%> and <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G1140>demon<s%>?"
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> "I do not <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G1140>demon;<s%> but I <S%G5091>honor<s%> My <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and you <S%G818>dishonor<s%> Me.
"But I do not <S%G2212>seek<s%> My <S%G1391>glory;<s%> there is One who <S%G2212>seeks<s%> and <S%G2919>judges.<s%>

<S%G281>"Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G5083>keeps<s%> My <S%G3056>word<s%> he shall <S%G3756>never<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2334>see<s%> <S%G2288>death.<s%>"

The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G3568>"Now<s%> we <S%G1097>know<s%> that You <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G1140>demon.<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G599>died,<s%> and the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> [also]; and You <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1437>'If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G5083>keeps<s%> My <S%G3056>word,<s%> he shall <S%G3756>never<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1089>taste<s%> of <S%G2288>death.<s%>'

<S%G3361>"Surely<s%> You are not <S%G3173>greater<s%> than our <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G599>died<s%>? The <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G2532>too;<s%> <S%G5101>whom<s%> do You <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G4572>Yourself<s%> out [to be]?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G1437>"If<s%> I <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G1683>Myself,<s%> My <S%G1391>glory<s%> is <S%G3762>nothing;<s%> it is My <S%G3962>Father<s%> who <S%G1392>glorifies<s%> Me, of <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G3004>say,<s%> 'He is our <S%G2316>God<s%>' ;

and you have not come to <S%G1097>know<s%> Him, but I <S%G3609>know<s%> Him; and <S%G2579>if<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> that I do not <S%G3609>know<s%> Him, I shall be a <S%G5583>liar<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> you, but I do <S%G3609>know<s%> Him, and <S%G5083>keep<s%> His <S%G3056>word.<s%>
"Your <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G21>rejoiced<s%> to <S%G3708>see<s%> My <S%G2250>day,<s%> and he <S%G3708>saw<s%> [it] and was <S%G5463>glad.<s%>"
The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "You are not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G4004>fifty<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> old, and have You <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%>?"
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G281>"Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G4250>before<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> was <S%G1096>born,<s%> I <S%G1510>am.<s%>"
